questions.question: How long does delivery take?
questions.answer: Standard delivery within the UK takes 2-4 business days.

questions.question: Can I track my order?
questions.answer: Yes, you will receive a tracking number once your order has been dispatched.

questions.question: Do you offer international shipping?
questions.answer: Currently, we only ship within the UK.

questions.question: Is next-day delivery available?
questions.answer: Yes, next-day delivery is available for orders placed before 2pm.

questions.question: What is your return policy?
questions.answer: You can return unused items within 14 days for a full refund.

questions.question: Can I exchange a product?
questions.answer: Yes, exchanges are available for items of the same value or less.

questions.question: How do I request a return?
questions.answer: Log in to your account and go to 'Orders' to initiate a return request.

questions.question: When will I get my refund?
questions.answer: Refunds are processed within 5–7 working days of receiving your return.

questions.question: Are your lenses compatible with Canon cameras?
questions.answer: Each lens specifies its mount type. Please check compatibility in the product description.

questions.question: Do you sell refurbished cameras?
questions.answer: Yes, we sell professionally refurbished cameras with a 6-month warranty.

questions.question: Do accessories come with a warranty?
questions.answer: Most accessories include a 12-month manufacturer’s warranty.

questions.question: Can I get advice on choosing a camera?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Contact our customer support or visit our buying guide.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and Klarna.

questions.question: Is my payment information secure?
questions.answer: Yes, all transactions are encrypted using SSL security.

questions.question: Do I need an account to order?
questions.answer: You can checkout as a guest, but creating an account allows for easier returns.

questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page to receive a reset link.

questions.question: Do you have a physical store?
questions.answer: We are currently online only but plan to open a showroom soon.

questions.question: Can I contact customer service?
questions.answer: Yes, our team is available Monday–Friday 9am–5pm via email or live chat.

questions.question: Are your products UK stock?
questions.answer: Yes, all our products are sourced from UK distributors with valid warranties.

questions.question: Do you price match competitors?
questions.answer: Yes, if you find a better price from a UK-based retailer, contact us to match.
